thread.title: Escape this Winter to Mexico and the Caribbean for up to 50% Off!
thread.title_full: Escape this Winter to Mexico and the Caribbean for up to 50% Off!

title: Escape this Winter to Mexico and the Caribbean for up to 50% Off!
text:
Escape this Winter to Mexico and the Caribbean for up to 50% Off! September 28, 2015 
Courtesy: Paradisus La Esmeralda, Playa del Carmen 
The deal : Up to 50 percent off at Meliá’s all-inclusive resorts in east Mexico and the Caribbean, including as low as $139 per person per night (some blackout dates apply). 
When you can go : Anytime through March 2016. 
Why we love it: While your friends shiver during winter in the U.S., you can escape for warmer climes for a great price. These rates include food and drinks, so eat and drink to your heart’s content. 
Where you can go: Deals include these resorts: Meliá Caribe Tropical Beach & Golf Resort in Punta Cana, Dominican Republic: $139 per night in January and $151 in February. Paradisus La Esmeralda in Playa Del Carmen, Mexico: $159 in December. Gran Meliá Puerto Rico Golf Resort on Cocoa Beach: $192 November to January. 
How long does this deal last? November 30 (subject to availability) 
This deal was provided by Travelzoo Tumblr
